l.m: 由于连日的大雨使江河水位不断地暴涨，
l.e: Due to continuous heavy rain, the water level of the river continued to soar,
Houses along the coast were washed away,
Fuxi was very worried about this.

l.m: 为什么会发生这样的情况？

c.m: 为什么会发生这样的情况

l.m: 有没有能够补救和预防的办法呢？
l.e: Is there a way to remedy and prevent it?

l.m: 这些问题一直困扰着伏羲，
l.e: These questions have always troubled Fuxi,

c.m: 这些问题一直困扰着伏羲

e.g: These questions have always troubled Fuxi

l.m: 使他感到茫然不知所措。
为了能够了解大自然这些奇奇怪怪的现象，
l.e: In order to be able to understand these strange phenomena of nature,

l.m: 为了能够替百姓分忧解难，
l.e: In order to be able to share the worries and problems of the people,

l.m: 他悉心揣摩着日月天地、
l.e: He thought carefully about the sun, moon, heaven and earth,
The cycle of change from time to time,
Carefully observe the cold and heat of the earth,
The changing law of flower blooming and fading.
Fuxi was fishing in the river,

l.m: 看到一只大白龟一个劲地想爬到岸上，
l.e: Seeing a big white turtle trying to climb to the shore,

e.g: trying to get to the shore

l.m: 在夕阳的照射下发出银色耀眼的光。
l.e: Shines silvery in the setting sun.

l.m: 俗话说龟是长寿的象征，
l.e: As the saying goes, the turtle is a symbol of longevity,
It must have its own reason.

l.m: 伏羲走过去帮助白龟上了岸。
l.e: Fuxi walked over and helped the white turtle get ashore.

l.m: 这只大白龟就一直跟着伏羲，
l.e: The big white turtle followed Fuxi all the time,

l.m: 可这只奇怪的大白龟不紧不慢地跟随他回了家。
l.e: But this strange big white tortoise followed him back home unhurriedly.

c.m: 不紧不慢地跟随他回了家

e.g: Follow him back home without hesitation

l.m: 这只大白龟之所以这样，
l.e: The reason why this big white turtle is like this,
There must be a reason for it!

l.m: 于是伏羲赶快挖了一个大水池，
l.e: So Fuxi quickly dug a big pool,

l.m: 伏羲正在往白龟池里放食物，
l.e: Fuxi is putting food into the white turtle pond,

l.m: 就有人跑来说河里出了怪物。
l.e: Someone came to say that there was a monster in the river.
He came to the river and looked,

l.m: 只见那怪物长得说龙不像龙，
l.e: I saw that the monster looked like a dragon like a dragon,
Said that a horse is not like a horse,

l.m: 如同在平路上行走一般。
l.e: It's like walking on a flat road.

l.m: 根本没有人能接近这家伙。
l.e: No one can get close to this guy at all.

l.m: 那怪物居然径直来到伏羲面前，
l.e: The monster actually came straight to Fuxi,

l.m: 发出一种人从未听到过的吼声，
l.e: With a roar such as no man has ever heard,

l.m: 把周围的人吓得逃得远远的。
l.e: Scared the people around and ran away.
Only Fuxi is calm and composed,

l.m: 这时怪物的吼声才慢慢地平息了下去，
l.e: Only then did the roar of the monster subside slowly.

l.m: 伏羲走上前抚摩着它光滑的脊背。
l.e: Fuxi stepped forward and stroked its smooth back.

l.m: 这怪物老老实实地站那儿一动不动，
l.e: The monster just stood there motionless,

l.m: 伏羲这才仔仔细细地将那怪物打量了一遍。
l.e: Only then did Fuxi take a closer look at the monster.

l.m: 只见那怪物背上长有花纹，
l.e: I saw patterns on the monster's back,

l.m: 伏羲似乎在什么地方见过，
l.e: Fuxi seems to have seen it somewhere,
But I can't remember it for a while.

l.m: 这不就是在第一次上‘建木’时，
l.e: Isn't this the first time I went to 'Jianmu',

l.m: 听一个白发老翁在口里一直叨唠的话吗？
l.e: Listen to what a white-haired old man keeps babbling in his mouth?

c.m: 一个白发老翁在口里一直叨唠的话吗

e.g: A white-haired old man babbling all the time?

l.m: ”伏羲赶快就地薅了一节蓍草梗，
l.e: " Fuxi quickly picked up a yarrow stalk on the spot,

l.m: 在一片大树叶上照着龙马背上的花纹画下来。
l.e: Draw on a big leaf according to the pattern on the dragon horse's back.

l.m: 就在伏羲刚画完最后一笔时，
l.e: Just when Fu Xi finished his last stroke,

l.m: 只听得这怪物又如同刚才一样大吼了一声，
l.e: The monster roared again just like before,
Gone in the blink of an eye.

l.m: 这时跑开去的人群都围住了伏羲问道：
l.e: At this time, the crowd who ran away surrounded Fuxi and asked:
"It is both a horse and a dragon,

l.m: 伏羲再一次拿起那片树叶，
l.e: Fuxi picked up the leaf again,
Thinking about the patterns on it,

l.m: 可怎么也解不开其中的奥妙。
l.e: But I can't solve the mystery.

l.m: 他不知不觉走到了白龟池边，
l.e: Unknowingly, he walked to the edge of the White Turtle Pond,

l.m: 忽然听见池子里的水“哗哗”作响。
l.e: Suddenly I heard the water in the pool "squeaking".

l.m: 才发现不知什么时候大白龟从水底游到了他面前，
l.e: Only then did he realize that at some point the big white turtle swam in front of him from the bottom of the water,

c.m: 什么时候大白龟从水底游到了他面前

e.g: When did the big white tortoise swim up to him from the bottom of the water

l.m: 接着又朝他点了三下头。
l.e: Then she nodded to him three more times.

l.m: 伏羲刚要走上前看个究竟，
l.e: Just as Fuxi was about to step forward to see what happened,

l.m: 这大白龟却把自己的脑袋往肚子里一缩，
l.e: The big white turtle shrank its head into its belly,
Lie on the water's edge and didn't move.

l.m: 对大白龟聚精会神地观察起来。
l.e: Observe the big white turtle attentively.

l.m: 他发现大白龟背上的花纹中间有五块，
l.e: He found that there are five pieces in the middle of the pattern on the back of the big white turtle.
There are a total of twelve yuan in the circle,

l.m: 外面一圈共有二十四块，
l.e: There are twenty-four yuan in the outer circle,
Immediately my heart brightened a lot.

l.m: 他又拿起刚才那片树叶，
l.e: He picked up the leaf just now,

l.m: 渐渐地悟出了天地万物的变化规律，
l.e: Gradually realized the law of change in the universe,
That is, one yin and one yang.

l.m: 他用不断的一条杠“—”作为阳；
l.e: He uses a continuous bar "—" as Yang;

l.m: 断了的一条杠“?鄄 ?鄄”作为阴，

l.e: Three bars are combined as a group,
Yin and Yang ebb and flow,

l.m: 伏羲把八卦又组成六十四卦，
l.e: Fuxi made the eight trigrams into sixty-four hexagrams,
Coupled with the change of the six lines,

l.m: 天气为什么会有冷暖变化，
l.e: Why does the weather change from warm to cold?

e.g: Why there are warm and cold changes

l.m: 日月为什么会有昼夜运转，
l.e: Why do the sun and the moon revolve day and night?

e.g: Why is there a day and night operation

l.m: 电闪雷鸣又是怎么回事，
等等这一切都可以知道由来，
l.e: Wait, you can know the reason for all this,
Or the reason can be speculated.

l.m: 自从伏羲画出了八卦图后，
l.e: Ever since Fuxi drew the Eight Diagrams,

l.m: 闹得天帝终日心神不宁，
l.e: The trouble made the emperor restless all day long,

l.m: 他便命天将下界查看人间出了什么怪事。
l.e: He ordered the Heavenly General to go down to the world to see what strange things happened in the world.

l.m: 伏羲用八卦早就算出了天帝的心机，
l.e: Fuxi used gossip to figure out the scheming of the emperor of heaven.

l.m: 为防止天将查出八卦图，
l.e: In order to prevent Tian Jiang from finding out the Bagua diagram,
Fuxi buried it in the ground,

l.m: 又拔了一棵柏树重新栽上，
l.e: Another cypress tree was pulled up and replanted,
Fu Xi was still not at ease.
North stamped the ground to compact the soil,
Make the cypress tree fall from left to right,

l.m: 伏羲封这棵柏树为八卦柏。
l.e: Fuxi named this cypress as Bagua cypress.
